talents.name: Improved Heroic Strike
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 3 rage points.

talents.name: Improved Rend
tooltip: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by 35%.

talents.name: Improved Charge
tooltip: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by 3.

talents.name: Tactical Mastery
tooltip: You retain up to 25 of your rage points when you change stances.

talents.name: Improved Thunder Clap
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 1 rage point.

talents.name: Improved Overpower
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 25%.

talents.name: Anger Management
tooltip: Increases the time required for your rage to decay while out of combat by 30%.

talents.name: Deep Wounds
tooltip: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 60% of your melee weapon's average damage over 12 sec.

talents.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Impale
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by 20%.

talents.name: Axe Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes by 1%.

talents.name: Sweeping Strikes
tooltip: Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

talents.name: Mace Specialization
tooltip: Gives you a 1% chance to stun your target for 3 sec with a Mace.

talents.name: Sword Specialization
tooltip: Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

talents.name: Polearm Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Polearms by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Hamstring
tooltip: Gives your Hamstring ability a 5% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

talents.name: Mortal Strike
tooltip: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

talents.name: Booming Voice
tooltip: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 10%.

talents.name: Cruelty
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

talents.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 8%.

talents.name: Unbridled Wrath
tooltip: Gives you a 40% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

talents.name: Improved Cleave
tooltip: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by 40%.

talents.name: Piercing Howl
tooltip: Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

talents.name: Blood Craze
tooltip: Regenerates 1% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

talents.name: Improved Battle Shout
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 25%.

talents.name: Dual Wield Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%.

talents.name: Improved Execute
tooltip: Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 5.

talents.name: Enrage
tooltip: Gives you a 25% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

talents.name: Improved Slam
tooltip: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Death Wish
tooltip: When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but lowers your armor and all resistances by 20%.  Lasts 30 sec.

talents.name: Improved Intercept
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Berserker Rage
tooltip: The Berserker Rage ability will generate 5 rage when used.

talents.name: Flurry
tooltip: Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

talents.name: Bloodthirst
tooltip: Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 45% of your attack power.  In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health.  This effect lasts 8 sec.

talents.name: Shield Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

talents.name: Improved Bloodrage
tooltip: Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by 2.

talents.name: Toughness
tooltip: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

talents.name: Iron Will
tooltip: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 3%.

talents.name: Last Stand
tooltip: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum hit points for 20 seconds.  After the effect expires, the hit points are lost.

talents.name: Improved Shield Block
tooltip: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack and increases the duration by 0.5 second.

talents.name: Improved Revenge
tooltip: Gives your Revenge ability a 15% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Defiance
tooltip: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 3% while in Defensive Stance.

talents.name: Improved Sunder Armor
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 1 rage point.

talents.name: Improved Disarm
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by 1 secs.

talents.name: Improved Taunt
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by 1 sec.

talents.name: Improved Shield Wall
tooltip: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by 3 secs.

talents.name: Improved Shield Bash
tooltip: Gives your Shield Bash ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.

talents.name: Shield Slam
tooltip: Slam the target with your shield, causing 225 to 235 damage, modified by your shield block value, and has a 50% chance of dispelling 1 magic effect on the target.  Also causes a high amount of threat.
